author: Russell Brand
description:
Watch my new Locals series 'The Oracles' here: https://russellbrand.locals.com/upost/6159441/the-last-pandemic-and-the-next-pandemic

In this episode, we dive deep into how globalism, technology, and modern ideologies work to separate us from our true selves and our creator. From the dark web's hidden horrors to the societal breakdown of identity, this thought-provoking discussion explores the forces shaping our reality and their deeper implications. Join us as we uncover the systems of control and seek truth in an age of mass delusion. Watch now and stay free!

WATCH me LIVE weekdays on Rumble: https://bit.ly/russellbrand-rumble

Watch my exclusive LIVE weekly special, “Break Bread”, get access to all of my interviews a week early, send in questions for me to respond to with guests, and more HERE: https://bit.ly/joinlocals

All links: https://linktr.ee/RussellBrand
title: Globalism’s Dark Agenda: The Slaughter of God Exposed"

author: Russell Brand
description:
Join us here for a PREVIEW of our daily one-hour RUMBLE show. 
To continue watching the show in full, join me exclusively over on RUMBLE: https://bit.ly/SF499-live

In today’s show – Russell Brand welcomes journalist Lara Logan for an in-depth conversation on media, truth, and spirituality. They go in-depth on the rise of independent media, challenges in breaking "information dominance," and the moral struggle within modern narratives. Lara shares her principles of real journalism, insights on globalism, and the spiritual battle shaping society.
